scripts.prepublishOnly: git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | grep -q 'main' && rm -rf out && tsc
scripts.watch: watchexec -c -w data/ -w src/ -e ts,fusion yarn run esbuild-main
scripts.watch-doc: watchexec -c -w data/ -w src/ -e ts,fusion yarn run esbuild-doc
scripts.watch-afx: watchexec -c -w data/ -w src/ -e ts,fusion yarn run esbuild-afx
scripts.watch-eel: watchexec -c -w data/ -w src/ -e ts,fusion yarn run esbuild-eel
scripts.version-patch: npm version patch && git push --tags && git push --all
